TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServerWebConfig extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IServerWebConfig

summary.span: 为启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序创建 Web.config 文件。

span.span: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

summary.span: 还可以在该文件中为要在应用程序中发布的 COM 接口添加组件项。

span.span: Can also add component entries to the file for COM interfaces being published in the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于在创建的虚拟根目录在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0 SOAP 启用 COM + 应用程序期间创建 Web.config 文件。The class is used to create a Web.config file during creation of a virtual root in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application. 它还可以将添加 XML 元素到组件接口添加到应用程序的 Web.config 文件。It also can add XML elements to the Web.config file for component interfaces being added to the application. 由.NET Framework 内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要在代码中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddElement (string FilePath, string AssemblyName, string TypeName, string ProgId, string WkoMode, out string Error);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddElement(string FilePath, string AssemblyName, string TypeName, string ProgId, string WkoMode, [out] string& Error) cil managed
Public Sub AddElement (FilePath As String, AssemblyName As String, TypeName As String, ProgId As String, WkoMode As String, ByRef Error As String)

public: virtual void AddElement(System::String ^ FilePath, System::String ^ AssemblyName, System::String ^ TypeName, System::String ^ ProgId, System::String ^ WkoMode, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % Error);
abstract member AddElement : string * string * string * string * string * -> unit override this.AddElement : string * string * string * string * string * -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: serverWebConfig.AddElement (FilePath, AssemblyName, TypeName, ProgId, WkoMode, Error)

param.name: FilePath
param.span: 现有 Web.config 文件的路径。

span.span: The path of the existing Web.config file.

param.name: AssemblyName
param.span: 包含要添加的类型的程序集的名称。

span.span: The name of the assembly that contains the type being added.
The name of the type being added.

param.name: ProgId
param.span: 要添加的类型的编程标识符。

span.span: The programmatic identifier for the type being added.

param.name: WkoMode
param.span: 一个字符串常数，它与 枚举中的一个成员的名称对应，该成员名称指示如何激活已知对象。

span.span: A string constant that corresponds to the name of a member from the enumeration, which indicates how a well-known object is activated.

param.name: Error
param.span: 一个可写入错误信息的字符串。

span.span: A string to which an error message can be written.

summary.span: 在 Web.config 文件中为要在启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序中发布的 COM 接口添加 XML 元素。

span.span: Adds XML elements to a Web.config file for a COM interface being published in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于指定的类型，方法将添加到 Web.config 文件``和``元素的子级作为``具有以下 XPath 元素：For the specified type, the method adds to the Web.config file the `` and `` elements as children of the `` element with the following XPath: `/configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service` `AssemblyName`， `TypeName`， `ProgId`，和`WkoMode`参数合并到两个添加的元素的属性值。The `AssemblyName`, `TypeName`, `ProgId`, and `WkoMode` parameters are incorporated into the attribute values of the two added elements. 应不直接调用。 should not be called directly. 而应调用方法。Instead, call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Create (string FilePath, string FilePrefix, out string Error);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Create(string FilePath, string FilePrefix, [out] string& Error) cil managed
Public Sub Create (FilePath As String, FilePrefix As String, ByRef Error As String)
public: virtual void Create(System::String ^ FilePath, System::String ^ FilePrefix, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % Error);
abstract member Create : string * string * -> unit override this.Create : string * string * -> unit

param.name: FilePath
param.span: 将在其中创建配置文件的文件夹。

span.span: The folder in which the configuration file should be created.

param.name: FilePrefix
param.span: 字符串值“Web”，将在它的后面添加 config 扩展名。

span.span: The string value "Web", to which a config extension is added.

param.name: Error
param.span: 一个可写入错误信息的字符串。

span.span: A string to which an error message can be written.

summary.span: 为启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序创建 Web.config 文件，以便准备在该文件中为要发布的 COM 接口添加 XML 元素。

span.span: Creates a Web.config file for a SOAP-enabled COM+ application so that the file is ready to have XML elements added for COM interfaces being published.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个 Web.config 文件包含具有以下 XPath 的空元素的层次结构：The method creates a Web.config file that contains the hierarchy for an empty element with the following XPath: ``` /configuration/system.runtime.remoting/application/service ``` 而不是实例化类对象，并调用直接调用方法。Instead of instantiating a class object and calling directly, call the method.
